introSection.introTitle: Abstract oil paintings in the original technique

homePage.detail: Immersive. Textured. Full of details for you to find.
homePage.detailDescription: You can discover paint strokes and new texture details every time you look closer on each painting.

offerSection.offer-description-1: Choose from wide range of art, available right away by special delivery without leaving home.
offerSection.offer-description-2: Created specially for you, based on selected pattern. Possible color, size, technique modifications.
offerSection.offer-description-3: Designed from scratch to match your space and style.

aboutPage.title: Wojciech Góra
aboutPage.subTitle: Artist and his workshop.
aboutPage.description-01: Graduate from the Academy of Fine Arts in Gdańsk. His works were exhibited in whole country and gain clients recognition in Europe e.g. UK or Spain.
aboutPage.description-02: Experience in design allows him to create with craftsmanship precision and at the same time, leaving some space for spontaneity and improvisation.
aboutPage.description-03: His paintings are characterized by own technique, mastered over the years,focused on precise details, geometry and multilayered textures. In spite inner complexity final compositions are always coherent & strong.
